  • Timeline

Submissions should be a CSV file with the columns "id" and "posts" (header should have column names in quotes).

Posts should be separated by spaces, so the line for user 8483 might look like: "8483, 345443 345353 366363 363625". (There is no disadvantage to listing up to 100 posts. The order does matter.)

It is also acceptable to submit one column (in the same order as the fle "testUsers") with only predictions, as long as it is in the right order.
